SELECT BOARD_NO, TITLE, DETAIL, PATH, CLASS_NO, HITS, B.TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_NICKNAME, PAYMENT,
TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS UPLOAD_DATE,
TO_CHAR(BILLING_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS BILLING_DATE, GRADE
FROM "BOARD" B JOIN "TRAINER" T ON (B.TRAINER_NO = T.TRAINER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND CLASS_NO = #{classNo}

SELECT R.COMMENT_NO, R.REVIEW_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(R.REVIEW_WRITE_DATE, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') AS REVIEW_WRITE_DATE, R.REVIEW_DEL_FL, R."NUMBER", R.MEMBER_NO, R.BOARD_NO, M.MEMBER_NAME AS "memberNickname" FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON (R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE R.BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND R.REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N' ORDER BY REVIEW_WRITE_DATE DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM REVIEW WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} AND REVIEW_DEL_FL = 'N'

SELECT BOARD_NO, IMG_THUMBNAIL "thumbnail", TITLE, TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_NICKNAME, UPLOAD_DATE, BILLING_DATE, PAYMENT, GRADE, CLASS_NO FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN TRAINER USING (TRAINER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL= 'N' ORDER BY GRADE DESC FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_NO, IMG_THUMBNAIL "THUMBNAIL", TITLE, TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPLOAD_DATE, TO_CHAR(BILLING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BILLING_DATE, PAYMENT, GRADE, CLASS_NO FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN TRAINER USING (TRAINER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL= 'N' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC FETCH FIRST 8 ROWS ONLY

SELECT BOARD_NO, IMG_THUMBNAIL "THUMBNAIL", TITLE, TRAINER_NO, TRAINER_NICKNAME, TO_CHAR(UPLOAD_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') UPLOAD_DATE, TO_CHAR(BILLING_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') BILLING_DATE, PAYMENT, GRADE, CLASS_NO, HITS FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN BOARD_IMG USING (BOARD_NO) JOIN TRAINER USING (TRAINER_NO) WHERE CLASS_NO = #{classNo} AND BOARD_DEL_FL= 'N'
ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC
ORDER BY GRADE DESC
ORDER BY HITS DESC
